org.gramar

Interface ITemplatingExtension

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClasspathTemplatingExtension, JarFileTemplatingExtension, TemplatingExtension

    public interface ITemplatingExtension
    Represents an object that extends the templating platform with tag handlers and/or XPath functions. Platform extensions can be deployed in many ways and each deployment method requires an implementation of ITemplatingExtension to answer the extending tag handlers and XPath functions.
    Author:
    chrisgerken
